original_title: Fucking Harry Palmer: An XXX Parody
overview: In Fucking Harry Palmer, one boy will do whatever he can... to get laid. This is the story of Harry Palmer, a boy with a flair for magic. He can use his powers for good or for evil, but mostly just to get boys into bed. When his arch-nemesis curses him over his summer break from school, it's up to Harry to do whatever it takes and fuck whoever he has to fuck to reverse it.
title: Fucking Harry Palmer: An XXX Parody
